title: SU Mega Pack
description: The Mega Pack includes one of each Soldier type + 1 Additional Infantry Soldier. Each soldier comes with high tier equipment along many modifications and 13 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.
longDescription:
The Mega Pack includes one of each Soldier type + 1 Additional Infantry Soldier. Each soldier comes with high tier equipment along many modifications and 13 upgraded vehicles including Tanks, Planes and Terrain Vehicles.

# Infantryman
- AVS-36 (Factory)
- Type L-41 JPH
- Field Adjusted Sights
- Field Trigger Job
- Lightened Spring
- Stainless Steel Barrel
- Tula Tokarev 33 (Factory)
- NR-40 'Scouts knife'
- Soviet First Aid Kit
- RGD-33
- GAZ-AAA Cargo
- GAZ-67 (Factory)
- PPSh-41 (Factory)
- Leonov Misha
- Field Adjusted Sights
- Field Trigger Job
- Lightened Bolt
- Stainless Steel Barrel
- Tula Tokarev 33 (Factory)
- Soviet Medic Pouch
- RGD-33
- T-20 Komsomolets (Factory)
- 42WLA (Soviet Lend-Lease)
